string-array.name: primary_content_description
string-array.item:
This part deals deals with material design recommended layouts to structure the content of application. Contains demo samples for seams, steps, 8dp rythms, elevations, shadows, metrics and region

  • Explore and Understand combining papers with seam

  • Arrange papers in steps

  • Play with elevations and shadows

  • Understand 8dp rhythm in margins and padding in various layouts

  • Recommended metrics

  • Explore different regions in an app screen
Long Styles, Themes and Backward Compatibility description
